title: Kansas, Looking to Fend Off N.C.A.A., Suspends Bill Self
description: The University of Kansas said Self, its menâ€™s basketball coach, would miss four games. An N.C.A.A. panel is still reviewing allegations stemming from a federal probe into corruption in the sport.
dc:creator: Adam Zagoria
media:description: Coach Bill Self was suspended by the University of Kansas as the N.C.A.A. investigates potential recruiting violations.
